channel.title: CVE Feed for HelpDezk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HelpDezk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3037|2023-10-04T11:10:09.394Z -- helpdezk -- helpdezk%20community
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in HelpDezk Community affecting version 1.1.10. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to access the platform without authentication and retrieve personal data via the jsonGrid parameter.
